data.name: Last Days of Spring Soundtrack
data.detailed_description:
The “Last Days of Spring” Official Soundtrack features music composed and produced by Antonio Lorenzo Carino. Relive this romantic and charming story through the enchanting, stylish and classy music that served as the soundtrack of this visual novel.

Track List
01 - Last Days of Spring.mp3
02 - A Hallway of Memories.mp3
03 - Magic Memories.mp3
04 - Having Fun.mp3
05 - Last Song of the Day.mp3
06 - Innocence of Youth.mp3
07 - Hidden Talents.mp3
08 - Cherry Blossoms.mp3
09 - Declaration of Love.mp3
10 - An Odd Character.mp3
11 - Sunset Train Ride.mp3

Note: Trailer song is not included in soundtrack.

fullgame.name: Last Days of Spring Visual Novel

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Microsoft® Windows® Vista / 7 / 8/ 8.1/ 10
  • Processor: Intel® Pentium® 4 2.0 GHz equivalent or faster processor
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated Graphics Chip
  • Storage: 50 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Microsoft® Windows® Vista / 7 / 8/ 8.1/ 10
  • Processor: Intel® Pentium® 4 2.0 GHz equivalent or faster processor
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated Graphics Chip
  • Storage: 50 MB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OS X 10.6 / 10.7 / 10.8
  • Processor: 1.5 GHz Intel Core 2 Duo or better
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated Graphics Chip
  • Storage: 50 MB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Mac OS X 10.6 / 10.7 / 10.8
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz Intel Core 2 Duo or better
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated Graphics Chip
  • Storage: 50 MB available space
